src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: I te Mane, i whakapuaki tūmatanuitia e ara Danius, te hekeretari ū o te Nobel Committee for Literature ki te Swedish Academy, i tētahi hōtaka reo irirangi ki Sveriges Radio ki Huitene ko te komiti, kāore i te āhei ki te whakapā tōtika atu ki a Bob Dylan mō tāna toa i te 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, kua whakarere i āna mahi ki te pā atu ki a ia.
hyp_text: Ārau te Rāapa, Sara Danius, kaiwhakahaere whakahirahira o te Kōmiti a te Whakaata Pukapuka a te Whare Akoranga ki Whiria, i whakapāho tonu ki runga i te whakaataataata ki Sveriges Radio ki Whenua, ā, kātahi kātahi te kōmiti, kahore i whiwhi a Bob Dylan, kātahi kātahi te 2016 Whakaata Pukapuka a te Whakaata ki te Pukapuka, kātahi kātahi te whakahaere ki te whiwhi i a ia.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: Nā te tino pikinga i te mahi te kāwanatanga o Īnia i ētahi mahi pērā i te tuku i ngā kaiwhakamau poaka ki ngā wāhi e tino pāngia ana, te tuku i ngā tini mano ārai naenae, me te uwhiuwhi i ngā paturiha.
hyp_text: Kua whakaatu te whakaora ki te kāwanatanga o Āndia ki te whakamahi i ngā kaupapa katoa i runga i te whāwhā o whakapiri i ngā rohe e ngākau ana, ki te whakawhiti ki ngā tākoto kōura a kaupapa ki te whakakaha ki ngā pīwakawaka.

src_text: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref_text: I mahi hoki ia i te whakairo i ngā pepa tāra ki ngā tini whenua, ko ētahi tauira o āna mahi nō nākuanei ko ngā whakaahua Pirimia ki te taha whakamua o te tāra $5 me te $100 hou o Kānata.
hyp_text: Koia koia i whakapapa ki te whakaputa pukapuka whenua maha, ko ngā taonga whakamārama o tāna mahi ko ngā whakaahua o te Pirimia o Kanata i te whakanui o ngā pukapuka $5 me $100 o te kākahu o te rangi.

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: "Kāore ōna whanonga ngāwhā e pēnei te tau i ngā ana nunui o te Ao nei e āhua ū ana te paemahana, ēngari e hāngai ana tērā kia noho ēnei hei puare hohono kei te papa," ko te kupu tēnei a Glen Cushing nō te Astreology Team o te United States Geological Survey (USGS), ā, nō Northern Arizona University kei Flagstaff, Arizona hoki.
hyp_text: Ka whakaaro a Glen Cushing, ngā kaiwhakaaro o te Rangapū o te Pūtaiao o te Whenua o te Rakiura, me te Whare Wānanga o Rākātāne o Flagstaff, Arizona, ko te whakamārama ko tātou ka whakaaro ko te whakaora o te hā o te tāngarau, kāore e whai wāhi ki ngā poka o te whenua o te whenua e whakapapa ana ki ngā poka o te whenua, engari ka whai whakaaro ki ngā poka o te whenua e whakapapa ana ki ngā poka o te whenua, he kaha ki ngā poka o te whenua.

src_text: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ref_text: "I ngaro i a au taku tuahine me tana hoa, nōku e haere ana ka tūpono au ki te hauā tokorua nei, e pekepeke noa ana, e whana noa ana te iwi nei i a rāua," te kōrera a Armand Versace.
hyp_text: Kua hoki au ki takureo, ā, ki runga i taku haere ka kitea au te rua kaitiaki whenua i roa, ngā tangata ka whakapiko, ngā kaitiaki ka whakaatu.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: I hangaia te koeko mīharo hei whakanui i a Pharaoh Khufu, ā, he maha ngā koeko iti iho, ngā toma, ngā temepara anō hoki i hangaia hei whakanui i ā Khufu wāhine, whanaunga hoki.
hyp_text: Ko te piramidi nui i whakamātaki i te Kupehu, ā, ko te tānguru o ngā piramidi, ngā whare tapu, me ngā whare whakapapa, i whakamātaki i ngā wahine, ngā tīpuna a Kupehu.

src_text: They were compelled to pay taxes to the U.S. colonial regime to defray a major part of the expenditures and the interest on bonds floated in the name of the Philippine government through the Wall Street banking houses.
ref_text: I pēhia rātou kia utu tāke ki te whakahaere koroniara o Ngā Whenua Tōpū o Amerika hei tuku pūtea hei utu i tētahi wāhanga nui o ngā utu me te itareti o ngā hononga-moni kua whakarewaina ki te ingoa o te kāwanatanga Piripīni mā ngā whare pēke o Wall Street.
hyp_text: Ka whāwhā ki a rātau ki te kāwanatanga whakapapa o te Pākehā ki te motu o Amerika ki te whakaputa ngā utu ki runga i te pūtea whakahaere whānui me te utu ki te papa whakahaere i whakarite i te kāwanatanga o te Kīngitanga o te Māori ki runga i te whare whakahaere o Wall Street.

src_text: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
ref_text: Ko te wā i tū ai ngā mahi e kīia whānuitia ana ko ngā High Midle Ages arā te wā o te hītori Ūropi i ngā rautau 11, 12 me te 13 hoki (AD 1000-1300).
hyp_text: He taua wā e whāia ana hei tāngata kē te kaupapa e whakamutunga ana, ko te Kaupapa Kūkūwai whānui, ko te tauhokohanga o te whakaaro o te Māhui o Pōneke i te 11, 12, 13 rā o te kōhanga (Kūkūwai 1000–1300).

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
ref_text: Ko tētahi o ngā tīno rautaki e whakamahia ai hei whakatauira i te hirahiratanga o te whakahoahoa he kōrero mō ngā āhuatanga pōuri o ngā tamariki i waiho kaungia, i harangia, i patungia rānei, i kore rānei i tīakina e ngā mātua i tō rātou ohinga ake.
hyp_text: E whā rāngai e whai mārama ana ki runga i ngā tāngata kākā o ngā tamariki e kaha nei ki te whakapapa ki ngā tamariki e kore e whai whānau, e kore e whai kaha, e kore e whai whakaaro, e kore e whai whakaawe e whai whānau ki a rātou i te whānau.

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.

hyp_text: E whakaatu ngā whakaaro, ko te mea nui ki ngā tangata, ko te mea kātahi rātou e hiahia ki ngā mea, ā, ko ngā mea i te rohe o rātou e whai ki ngā mea ki te kore ki te whai ki ngā mea.

src_text: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
ref_text: Mehemea ka pā tētahi tohu hāereere ki te whenua e torohia ana e koe, ka pāngia pea tō inihua hauora hāereere, tō inihua whakakore haerenga rānei.

src_text: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
ref_text: Mēnā koe ka pae ki uta mā runga kaipike, kaore noa he take o te pane uruwhenua (atu i te tau 2009).

src_text: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ref_text: Ko ngā kararehe ongeonge pērā i te pia parāone o Ūropi, i te wuruhi, i te īkara, i te koukou, i te riniki, i te ngeru mohoao, i te capercaillie ka kitea ki reira, me ngā tini momo anō hoki.
